thread.title: Chris Wallace to Gary Cohn: Why Should We Believe Jobs Numbers Trump Used to Dismiss?
thread.title_full: Chris Wallace to Gary Cohn: Why Should We Believe Jobs Numbers Trump Used to Dismiss? | Mediaite

author: mediaite
title: Chris Wallace to Gary Cohn: Why Should We Believe Jobs Numbers Trump Used to Dismiss?
text:
Please enable Javascript to watch. On Fox News Sunday today, Chris Wallace asked White House Chief Economic Advisor Gary Cohn about President Trump ‘s past dismissals of jobs numbers.
The White House touted the numbers out this past Friday, but as Wallace pointed out, during the campaign Trump called similar reports “phony.”
Sean Spicer Quote: d Trump as explaining , “They may have been phony in the past, but they are very real now.”
Wallace played video of Trump dismissing the “phony” numbers and asked Cohn, “If that’s true, why should we believe these numbers? And the fact is, did you inherit an economy that has been for the last 18 months somewhere between 4.6 and 5 percent unemployment?”
Cohn touted how the economy is continuing to grow and said that there are CEOs telling Trump, “We are creating these jobs because [of] you, Mr. President, and your policies.”
Watch above, via Fox.
